required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Food Interaction Study To Assess the Effect of Food on the Pharmacokinetics of Esomeprazole 20 mg/Acetylsalicylic Acid 81 mg
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase I, Open-label, Randomized, Single-center, 2-way Crossover Food Interaction Study To Assess the Effect of Food on the Pharmacokinetics of the Fixed Dose Combination Capsule of Esomeprazole 20 mg/Acetylsalicylic Acid 81 mg

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of the study is to investigate the effects of food, in comparison to fasting conditions, on the extent and rate of absorption of acetylsalicylic acid (ASA) and esomeprazole.

primary_outcome.measure: To investigate the effects of food on the extent and rate of absorption of ASA and esomeprazole after a single dose administration of esomeprazole 20mg/ASA 81 mg FDC in healthy volunteers by assessment of AUC, AUC(0-t), and Cmax
primary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples for ASA and SA analyses will be taken at predose, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1, 1.25, 1.5, 1.75, 2, 2.25, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, and 14 hours after dose administration

primary_outcome.measure: To investigate the effects of food on the extent and rate of absorption of ASA and esomeprazole after a single dose administration of esomeprazole 20mg/ASA 81 mg FDC in healthy volunteers by assessment of AUC, AUC(0-t), and Cmax
primary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples for esomeprazole analysis will be taken at predose, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4, 4.5, 5, 5.5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, and 14 hours after dose adminstration

secondary_outcome.measure: To investigate PK of ASA and esomeprazole by assessment of tmax and t1/2λz under fed and fasting conditions.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples for ASA and SA analyses will be taken at predose, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1, 1.25, 1.5, 1.75, 2, 2.25, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, and 14 hours after dose administration

secondary_outcome.measure: To investigate the PK of ASA metabolite salicylic acid (SA) by assessment of AUC, AUC(0-t), Cmax, tmax and t1/2λz under fed and fasting conditions.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples for ASA and SA analyses will be taken at predose, 0.25, 0.5, 0.75, 1, 1.25, 1.5, 1.75, 2, 2.25, 2.5, 3, 4, 5, 6, 8, 10, 12, and 14 hours after dose administration

secondary_outcome.measure: To assess the safety and tolerability of esomeprazole 20mg/ASA 81 mg FDC.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: AEs will be collected from the time of randomization up to and including the follow-up visit. SAEs will be recorded from the time of informed consent up to and including the follow up visit

secondary_outcome.measure: To investigate the PK of ASA metabolite salicylic acid (SA) by assessment of AUC, AUC(0-t), Cmax, tmax and t1/2λz under fed and fasting conditions.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Blood samples for esomeprazole analysis will be taken at predose, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4, 4.5, 5, 5.5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 12, 13, and 14 hours after dose adminstrationy.

arm_group.description: esomeprazole 20mg/ASA 81 mg FDC after a 10-hour fast
esomeprazole 20mg/ASA 81 mg FDC 30 minutes after start of a high-fat, high-calorie breakfast

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Healthy adults who provide informed consent prior to any study-related procedures. Females must be of non-child bearing potential.
- Weight of 50-95kg, inclusive, and a BMI between 19-30 kg/m2, inclusive.
- No clinically significant abnormal findings as judged by the Investigator on enrollment physical exam.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Recent history of any clinically significant illness as judged by the Investigator within two weeks prior to enrolling in the study
- History of heart, kidney, liver. or gastrointestinal disease considered to be significant as judged by the Investigator
- Moderate to heavy smoking or other nicotine use (greater than 10 cigarettes per day or corresponding amount of nicotine)
